intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Can you play sports at school?
How do you stay in touch with friends?
What do you like to do in the spring?
Can you tell me about your family?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: The examiner is the café worker. You are a customer.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to eat?

respond_situations.description: The examiner is the shop assistant. You are a shopper.

ask_situations.instruction: You want to borrow a book from a classmate. ..
While shopping, ask a shopkeeper for the price of a toy.
At school, ask a friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I love singing songs. Songs make me happy. I sing in the car. I sing with friends. Music is fun to share.

questions.question: Why do songs make me happy?

follow_up_questions.question: What color is your school uniform?
When do you wear your uniform?
Do you like your school uniform?
How do you feel in your uniform?
